title: Hextech Loot Bug!!!
body:
Whan i opened my hextech chest i lost connection and whan i restarted client , there was no key or chest that i was oppening,
and in loot (Skin shards, Champ Shards, Wards, Icons, Gemstones) there was nothing new.
Can you please do something.

i just lost 1 chest adn key for nothing!!!{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: This can happen if your connection had a hiccup, so it didn't load your hextech assets.  A restart should fix this, otherwise the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide can help clear out any blocks to the service.
